seller_name: G. ANIL KUMAR, M/s. PVNR CONSTRUCTIONS (represented by its Managing Partners SRI. V.NARAYANA REDDY & SRI. K RAMACHANDRA REDDY)
planned_area_source: As per copy of gram panchayat plan
area_comments: As per the copy of gram panchayat plan and sale deed, 1,224 sft was identified to be the built-up area. No deviation between planned and actual area.
setback_comments: As per the copy of gram panchayat plan, the permitted setbacks are 5 feet (front) and 3 feet (other sides). Actual setback measurements are not specified.
amenities: Modular Kitchen (one-time: NA, recurring: NA); Wardrobes (one-time: NA, recurring: NA); Covered Car Park (one-time: NA, recurring: NA)
occupancy_comments: Based on the contact person and interior photos, the property is self-occupied by the owner.
construction_comments: The property is a completed residential independent house with RCC roof and full amenities as per the plan.
address_1_comparable_1: House on Plot No. 160/Part & 161 (As per documents)
address_2_comparable_1: House on Plot No. 161 (As per site)
market_value_definition: Market Value is defined as 'an opinion of the best price at which the sale of an interest in property would have been completed unconditionally for cash consideration on the date of the valuation, assuming (1) a willing seller; (2) that, prior to the date of valuation, there had been a reasonable period (having regard to the nature of the property and the state of the market) for the proper marketing of the interest and for the agreement of the sale price; (3) that, the state of the market, level of values and other circumstances were, on any earlier assumed date of exchange of contracts, the same as on the date of valuation; (4) that no account is taken of any additional bid by a prospective buyer with a special interest; (5) that both parties to the transaction had acted knowledgeably, prudently and without compulsion.'
valuer_comments:
• The subject property is a residential independent house located at Plot No. 161, Shankar Green Homes, Ameenpur Village, Patancheru Mandal, Medak District, Telangana. 
• As per the registered sale deed and gram panchayat plan, the land area is 1,656 sft (184 sq yds) and the built-up area is 1,224 sft. 
• The property is RCC roofed, G+1 configuration, and was constructed in 2015. 
• The house is self-occupied, with good exterior and interior condition, modular kitchen and wardrobes as amenities. 
• The valuation is based on comparable sale method using the registered sale deed. 
• No negative area features were observed in the surroundings. 
• Permitted setbacks are as per gram panchayat plan. 
• The property is within city limits, in a residential colony. 
• For the purpose of this value assessment, it is assumed that the property has clear title and all necessary permissions as per sale deed and plan copy. 
• No vertical or unit deviations have been observed.
valuer_declaration: I confirm that the market value for the subject property as on 10 June 2024 is INR 1,776,800/- [One Million Seven Hundred Seventy Six Thousand Eight Hundred Rupees] taking into consideration the market dynamics and the condition of the property, its location, and amenities available.
disclaimer_text: Please note that the above is a valuation and not a structural survey. CBRE is not responsible to HSBC or the purchaser of the above property for any flaws and/or faults with the property not detected by the above Valuer.
